steps.step_name: Wait for Excel to Launch in New Window

craft_bugs.title: Copilot Dialog UX Issue: Take Screenshot - Copilot Dialog
craft_bugs.description: Copilot dialog appeared in step 'Take Screenshot - Copilot Dialog', which can disrupt user workflow and create confusion
craft_bugs.recommendation: Consider making Copilot opt-in rather than automatic, or provide clear dismissal options

craft_bugs.title: Unexpected Dialog Interruption: Dismiss Copilot Dialog

craft_bugs.recommendation: Implement proactive dialog detection and dismissal to prevent workflow interruptions

craft_bugs.title: Cell Interaction Issue: Take Screenshot - Data Entered

craft_bugs.recommendation: Improve cell interaction patterns and ensure consistent cell selection behavior

craft_bugs.recommendation: Implement auto-save functionality or provide clearer save status indicators

craft_bugs.title: Multiple Dialog Interruptions

craft_bugs.recommendation: Minimize dialog interruptions and implement smoother workflow transitions
